A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is wonderful. I seriously do not understand how people rave about Rouge\, and diss this one. This had everything that made the first one so good. Humor\, action\, story. I loved it. This is my favorite Star Wars movie out of the franchise right now. We saw it when it opened and the audience was having a blast. Whooping and clapping. It was fun non stop. LOVE IT.
